analysis.description:
EpigenCareCrowdsale.rejectRequest (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#341-359) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(fee) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#352-355)
	- user.transfer(transaction.weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#355)

Reentrancy in EpigenCareCrowdsale.validateTransaction (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#306-322):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFrom(tokenPool,purchaser,transaction.tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#319-320)
	External calls sending eth:
	- wallet.transfer(transaction.weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#321)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- transactions (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#321-322)
	- transactions (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#322)

EpigenCareCrowdsale.requestTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#283-306) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenPool,beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#293-295)

EpigenCareCrowdsale.validateTransaction (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#306-322) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenPool,purchaser,transaction.tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#319-320)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x7021967e5d0761772c6fb25304f2d013865aba7c.sol#88-89)
